name: createTopSongsPlaylistClaude
description: Find top streaming songs using claudeTask (web research) and create a Spotify playlist — compare against createTopSongsPlaylist which uses hardcoded chosic.com

genre.description: Music genre (e.g. bluegrass, jazz, country, rock, hip-hop)

quantity.description: Number of top songs to include

parameters.goal: You MUST use the WebSearch or WebFetch tools to find current data — do not answer from memory. Search for the top ${quantity} ${genre} songs of 2025 on a chart site (chosic.com, rateyourmusic.com, or similar). Fetch the page and extract the song list. Return ONLY a JSON array of objects with "trackName" and "artist" fields. If you cannot find songs, return an empty array []. Output nothing except the JSON array.
